name: Average Monty Python and the Holy Grail Quiz | 10 Questions | Movies

questions.text: What is the weight ratio between the swallow and the coconut?
questions.explanation:
5oz.-1lb

	'A five ounce bird can not carry a 1 pound coconut!'

Bedevere.

	'Who are you who are so wise in the ways of science?'

options: she weighs the same as a duck.
you can build a bridge out of her.
questions.explanation:
'cause they're made of wood.

	'If she weighs the same as a duck...she's made of wood.' 'And therefore...' 'A witch.'

the French.

	'I blow my nose at you so called Aurter-Ting! You and all your English conigits!'

questions.text: How many heads does the knight Sir Robin talks to have?
questions.explanation:
3 & Three.

	'Who are you?' 'He is brave Sir..' 'Shut up! No one, really.'

Castle Anthrax.

	'Let me face the peril.' 'No, it's too perilous.'

Concord.

	'Brave Concord, you shall not've died in vain!' 'Actually, I could pull through, sir.' 'Oh, you shall not have been mortally wounded in vain.' 'I think I'm alright to come with you, sir.'

questions.text: How many questions does King Arthur say the bridge keeper asks?
questions.explanation:
5.

	'Let me handle it, I shall make a pass to the north and...' 'No, hold on, just answer the five questions...' 'Three questions.' '...Three questions as best you can.'

questions.text: What is the monster at the Cave of Kerbanough?
